prompt: <description>Part 1: Construction of the Base Rectangular Prism Create a new coordinate system with no rotation or translation. On the XY plane of the coordinate system, create a new sketch. 1. Draw line 1 from (0,0) to (0.75,0). 2. Draw line 2 from (0.75,0) to (0.75,0.6375). 3. Draw line 3 from (0.75,0.6375) to (0,0.6375). 4. Draw line 4 from (0,0.6375) to (0,0). This closed loop forms a rectangle. The rectangle is then scaled by a factor of 0.75. Extrude the rectangle by 0.03 units in the positive Z direction to create the first part. This will result in a 3D model of a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. Part 2: Construction of the Sloped Side Create a new coordinate system with no rotation, and a translation vector of (0.1223, 0.393, 0.03). On the XY plane of the coordinate system, create a new sketch. 1. Draw line 1 from (0,0) to (0.5325,0). 2. Draw line 2 from (0.5325,0) to (0.5325,0.18). 3. Draw line 3 from (0.5325,0.18) to (0,0.18). 4. Draw line 4 from (0,0.18) to (0,0). This closed loop forms a rectangle. The rectangle is then scaled by a factor of 0.5325. Extrude the rectangle by 0.03 units in the negative Z direction to create the second part. This will result in a rectangular prism with a sloped side. Part 3: Construction of the Rounded Corners Create a new coordinate system with no rotation, and a translation vector of (0.0584, 0.2451, 0.03). On the XY plane of the coordinate system, create a new sketch. 1. Draw line 1 from (0,0) to (0.09,0). 2. Draw line 2 from (0.09,0) to (0.09,0.09). 3. Draw line 3 from (0.09,0.09) to (0,0.09). 4. Draw line 4 from (0,0.09) to (0,0). This closed loop forms a square. The square is then scaled by a factor of 0.09. Extrude the square by 0.03 units in the negative Z direction to create the third part. This will result in a 3D model of a rectangular prism with rounded corners. The final model consists of these three parts. The base rectangular prism has a length, width, and height of 0.75 units, 0.75 units, and 0.03 units, respectively. The sloped side rectangular prism has a length, width, and height of 0.5325 units, 0.5325 units, and 0.03 units, respectively. The rounded corner rectangular prism has a length, width, and height of 0.09 units, 0.09 units, and 0.03 units, respectively.</description>
